message.body: Holiday inn at penns landing is $81 a night for 2 queens and we can get a roll away bed or bring an air matress. Mom emma and snoop in one bed. You and olivia in one and iliana and me in one.
I was thinking check in 12/24 and out 12/26. Two night stay.
Book it!!!
That's a great deal.
Even if mom doesn't come, we can stay there!
Its got free wifi and free breakfast. Breakfast alone save us money
Yeah it does. And if it's too crowded I'll just borrow a car and run home.
Okay cool. We have to think of festive things to do since we wont be doing the traditional tree an all
We can go to boathouse row and see the light. We can see the huge tree at macys.
It's in the old wannamaker building.
Old city will be really pretty too.
We can take the girls ice skating again. This time I won't go
I will also want you guys to see my new house! We can cook dinner there one night maybe
PS if it's just you and Iliana I want you guys to stay at the house.
Could we possibly cancel if mom backs out
The hotel I mean

The hotel is non refundable. I think it's $20 extra total to be able to cancel. I may select to just do that. Im not going to book today, I'm going to wait until next week. We can smooth out some wrinkles
I also want to call and see if the accept pets, thats a deal breaker for mom
Are we going to rent a car for mom?
Yes. I will take care of that
If you get hotel
((Its only $16 total to be able to cancel))
Remember mom will need the cash up front to put on her card, also to cover the deposit. The drivers card is the one that has to be used so you cant book directly from your card
I can help you with that of you need me to
It will be $200 for a 5 day rental from bennington 12/23-12/27
If she wants to drive down a day early, i will book the room for her for an extra night so she doesnt waste a day driving
The hotel also offers a free 2 mile local shuttle.
Oh shit. It says no pets allowed :(
Maybe we can sneak him in
Did you check the Hyatt?
There are a lot of pet friendly hotels in philly. A bit more expensive. I'll do some research
Okay. Sounds good.
I need your social and zip code to list you as the primary beneficiary if i die
Erase that after
Jen is preg again!!
She told me!!!
What a nitemare!
Lol
She should not be procreating so much. Yikes.
Lol
Im here w dad at a pizza place he said hi
Haha. Jk
Tell him hi!! I'll call him this weekend ! I want pizza!!!
Large cheese 5.99. Didnt even plan to run into him. Haha
Small town.
Haha!!! Aw that's cool
